thread.title: Chile's 'A Fantastic Woman' set to make Oscar history

title: Chile's 'A Fantastic Woman' set to make Oscar history
text:
Chile's 'A Fantastic Woman' set to make Oscar history 7:24am IST - 01:08 
Chilean director Sebastian Lelio talks about his film ''A Fantastic Woman'' which follows a transgender woman trying to prove her worth. Rough Cut - no reporter narration ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
